summary: This is an email from the U.S. Department of Justice forwarding a voice message from a wireless caller to the Epstein Victims email address. The email was sent on July 30, 2019, and includes an audio attachment of the message.

events.title: Voice message forwarded to Epstein Victims email
events.description: A voice message from a wireless caller was forwarded via email to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein Victims email address.

keyFacts: A voice message from a wireless caller was forwarded to the official Epstein Victims email address (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov) on July 30, 2019.
The email originated from a U.S. Department of Justice email address (postmaster@voi.usa.doj.gov), indicating official handling of victim communications.
The email contains an audio attachment of the voice message, suggesting it was preserved as potential evidence or information for the investigation.
